extension.description:
To support game audio file used by some Nintendo DS games.
Dual Screen Sound Format is an audio format based on PSF. It stores audio ripped from the ROMs of Nintendo DS games. Music instructions are stored in files with a .2sflib extension and the music notation is stored in files with a .mini2sf extension.
ASAP (Another Slight Atari Player) plays on Kodi and converts 8-bit Atari music (*.sap, *.cmc, *.mpt, *.rmt, *.tmc, ...) on modern computers and mobile devices.

DUMB is a module audio renderer library. It reads module files and outputs audio that can be dumped to the actual audio playback library.
On Kodi Supports playback of the following module formats: - IT (Impulse Tracker) - XM (Fasttracker II) - S3M (Scream Tracker 3)

FluidSynth is a real-time software synthesizer based on the SoundFont 2 specifications and has reached widespread distribution. FluidSynth itself does not have a graphical user interface, but due to its powerful API several applications utilize it and it has even found its way onto embedded systems and is used in some mobile apps.

Game Music Emu (GME) format is used to emulate the audio output of various video game consoles popular in the 1980s and 1990s. It gives a "retro" feel to the sound.
Suppoted Formats: - AY: ZX Spectrum/Amstrad CPC - GBS: Nintendo Game Boy - GYM: Sega Genesis/Mega Drive - HES: NEC TurboGrafx-16/PC Engine - KSS: MSX Home Computer/other Z80 systems (no FM sound) - NSF/NSFE: Nintendo NES/Famicom (with VRC 6, Namco 106, and FME-7 sound) - SAP: Atari systems using POKEY sound chip - SPC: Super Nintendo/Super Famicom - VGM/VGZ: Sega Master System/Mark III, Sega Genesis/Mega Drive,BBC Micro

GSF is a addon for Kodi which adds the ability to play Game Boy Advance music files, the GSF format (MINIGSF and GSFLIB files). This player is based on the Visual Boy Advanced emulator, although the sound quality appears to be identical to Highly Advanced.

Plays MOD files and few other formats.
It is recommended to use "OpenMPT Audio Decoder" addon instead of this one.

extension.summary: NCSF (Nitro Composer Sound Format) Audio Decoder
extension.description:
Adds decoding support for Nitro Composer Sound Format files (.NCSF/.MININCSF).
Nitro Composer Sound Format (NCSF) is a PSF-style for Nintendo DS music, specifically music that was created via Nitro Composer, a tracker-like composer that is part of Nintendo's Nitro SDK for the Nintendo DS.

The Nintendo Sound Format (NSF) is a container format, that holds audio code ripped from the ROMs of games for the Nintendo Entertainment System. The NES had a pretty good sound engine for its time supporting 2 pulse-waves, 1 triangle wave, a noise channel, and DPCM channel which is a raw 7-bit counter raw sample playback.

OpenMPT (short hand for Open ModPlug Tracker) is completely free and his library allows you play back some great music on your Kodi.
It supports loading of IT (Impulse Tracker), XM (FastTracker Extended Module), MOD (ProTracker and similar), S3M (Scream Tracker 3) and MPTM (its own file format) files, imports many more module and sample file formats.
See his website for complete list of supported types.

Organya is a music format used in "Cave Story", created by the Japanese programmer "Pixel". As well as being used in the original game, there is a large and active Cave Story fan community which creates music in this format, both for standalone to play and for use in mods for the game.
This addon allows playing of .ORG files for this format.

Adds decoding support for Capcom QSound Sound Format files (.QSF/.MINIQSF).
QSound is the original name for a positional three-dimensional (3D) sound processing algorithm from QSound Labs that creates 3D audio effects from multiple monophonic sources and sums the outputs to two channels for presentation over regular stereo speakers.

Sound Interface Device (SID) is a format that houses Commodore 64 and 128 music.
This is a addon that implements the emulation of the C64's SID chip (MOS 6581) and CPU (6510) by .SID or .SIDSTREAM files.

The SPC format holds Super Nintendo (SNES) game music. It is named after Sony's SPC700 contribution to the SNES's S-SMP audio chip. The SNES was a major jump in audio technology from the NES allowing for stereo sound, more channels, and fully sampled instruments.
Sega Saturn Sound Format (SSF) and Dreamcast Sound Format (DSF) is an audio format based on PSF. It stores audio ripped from the ROMs of Sega Saturn and Sega Dreamcast games.

YM (YM2149 Music) is an audio format that logs instructions sent to an AY-3-8910 or YM2149 chip. Playback occurs by emulating the chips and sending the logged data to them. Because the format merely logs the instructions to the chip, it doesn't preserve the original content of the music format.

TiMidity is a software synthesizer that can play MIDI files without a hardware synthesizer.
To use TiMidity you need a working timidity.cfg config file or sound fonts. Copy this files into the directory you intend to store and select it in the Add-on Settings.
Adds decoding support for Sony Playstation Sound Format files (.PSF/.MINIPSF).

extension.summary: USF - Nintendo Ultra 64 Sound Format Decoder
extension.description: This is a decoder which adds support for playing (Ultra) Nintendo 64 Sound format (.USF/.MINIUSF) files.
Video Game Music (VGM) Audio Decoder is a library for playing a wide variety of audio formats used in video games.

WonderSwan R (WSR) is a container format, that holds audio code ripped from the ROMs of games for the WonderSwan and WonderSwan Color handheld game system. Both the original and color versions used the same audio chip which could handle 4 PCM audio channels.

FLAC stands for Free Lossless Audio Codec, an audio format similar to MP3, but lossless, meaning that audio is compressed in FLAC without any loss in quality. This is similar to how Zip works, except with FLAC you will get much better compression because it is designed specifically for audio, and you can play back compressed FLAC files in your favorite player (or your car or home stereo, see supported devices) just like you would an MP3 file.
FLAC stands out as the fastest and most widely supported lossless audio codec, and the only one that at once is non-proprietary, is unencumbered by patents, has an open-source reference implementation, has a well documented format and API, and has several other independent implementations.

extension.summary: LAME is a high quality MPEG Audio Layer III (MP3)
extension.description: It use LAME, the high quality MPEG Audio Layer III (MP3) encoder licensed under the LGPL.
Vorbis is a general purpose perceptual audio CODEC intended to allow maximum encoder flexibility, thus allowing it to scale competitively over an exceptionally wide range of bitrates.
WAV (Waveform Audio Format) is an uncompressed sound format.

extension.summary: Libretro compatibility layer for Kodi's Game API
extension.description: This add-on provides a wrapper for libretro cores, allowing them to be loaded as game add-ons.

Join the numbers and get to the 2048 tile!
Use your arrow keys to move the tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one!
Created by Gabriele Cirulli. Based on 1024 by Veewo Studio and conceptually similar to Threes by Asher Vollmer.

4DO emulates the 3DO Interactive Multiplayer video game system, often called simply the 3DO.
4DO is based on the FreeDO source code.
Supported files: .iso, .bin, .chd, .cue

Beetle bSNES is the SNES module of Beetle, a fork of Mednafen. Mednafen's SNES module itself is a fork of bSNES v0.59.
Supported files: .smc, .fig, .bs, .st, .sfc

extension.summary: Nintendo - Game Boy Advance (Beetle GBA) v0.9.36
extension.description:
Beetle GBA is a fork of Mednafen's GBA core for the libretro project.
Supported files: .gba, .agb, .bin

Beetle Lynx is the Atari Lynx module of Beetle, a fork of Mednafen. The Mednafen module is a fork of Handy.
Supported files: .lnx, .o

addon.name: SNK - Neo Geo Pocket / Color (Beetle NeoPop)

extension.summary: SNK - Neo Geo Pocket / Color (Beetle NeoPop) v0.9.36.1
extension.description:
Based on NeoPop, this emulator is not very accurate in terms of low-level details. However, it is sufficient to play most commercially released games fairly well.
Supported files: .ngp, .ngc, .ngpc, .npc

addon.name: NEC - PC Engine / CD (Beetle PCE FAST)

extension.summary: NEC - PC Engine / CD (Beetle PCE FAST) v0.9.38.7
extension.description:
Beetle PCE Fast, a PC Engine emulator for Libretro, is a fork of Mednafen's PC Engine driver.
Supported files: .pce, .cue, .ccd, .chd
Supported files: .cue, .ccd, .toc, .chd

Beetle PSX is the PlayStation module of Beetle, a port of Madnafen.
Supported files: .exe, .cue, .toc, .ccd, .m3u, .pbp, .chd

extension.summary: NEC - PC Engine SuperGrafx (Beetle SuperGrafx) v1.23.0
extension.description:
Source: https://github.com/libretro/beetle-supergrafx-libretro
Supported files: .pce, .sgx, .cue, .ccd, .chd

Source: https://github.com/libretro/beetle-vb-libretro
Supported files: .vb, .vboy, .bin

Standalone port of Mednafen WonderSwan to libretro, itself a fork of Cygne.
Supported files: .ws, .wsc, .pc2

BlueMSX is a rich MSX emulator. It supports most common machines and a wide variety of extension hardware.
Supported extensions: .rom, .ri, .mx1, .mx2, .col, .sg, .sc
Authors: Daniel Vik, Benoit Delvaux, Tomas Karlsson, Johan van Leur, Ricardo Bittencourt and Ray Zero
Supported files: .rom, .ri, .mx1, .mx2, .dsk, .col, .sg, .sc, .cas, .m3u

libretro port of bNES, a NES emulator.
Authors: byuu, Ryphecha.
Supported files: .nes

bSNES Mercury is a fork of Higan (originally called bSNES), notable for emulating the original hardware as accurately as possible through low-level, cycle-accurate emulation.
The "Accuracy" profile focuses on accuracy at the cost of performance.
http://byuu.org/
Supported files: .sfc, .smc, .bml

bSNES Mercury is a fork of Higan (originally called bSNES), notable for emulating the original hardware as accurately as possible through low-level, cycle-accurate emulation.
The "Balanced" profile is a good compromise between accuracy and performance.
http://byuu.org/
Supported files: .sfc, .smc, .bml

bSNES Mercury is a fork of Higan (originally called bSNES), notable for emulating the original hardware as accurately as possible through low-level, cycle-accurate emulation.
The "Performance" profile focusses more on execution speed than on accuracy.
http://byuu.org/
Supported files: .sfc, .smc, .bml

Caprice32 is an emulator for the Amstrad CPC 8-bit home computer series. It faithfully imitates the CPC464, CPC664, and CPC6128 models.
Written by Ulrich Doewich.
Supported files: .dsk, .sna, .zip, .tap, .cdt, .voc, .cpr, .m3u

Dinothawr is a block-pushing puzzle game on slippery surfaces. It is your task to free the dinosaur hero's friends from their ice prison.
Supported files: .game

DOSBox emulates an IBM PC compatible computer running MS-DOS. DOSBox can be configured to run a wide range of DOS games, from CGA/Tandy/PCjr classics up to games from the Quake era.
. If loading exe/com/bat the system directory will be searched for a 'dosbox.conf' file to load. If loading a *.conf file DOSBox will be loaded with the options in the config file.
Supported files: .exe, .com, .bat, .conf

Final Burn Alpha is an emulator of arcade games, including Capcom CPS-1 and CPS-2, SNK Neo-Geo, Toaplan, Cave and Sega System 16. FB Alpha is based on the original FinalBurn.
Icon credit: TRIPLEKILLZ (triplekillz.deviantart.com)
Supported files: .zip, .7z
extension.disclaimer: The authors of FB Alpha don't guarantee its fitness for any purpose, implied or otherwise, and do not accept responsibility for any damages whatsoever that might occur when using FB Alpha. All games emulated by FB Alpha, including any images and sounds therein, are copyrighted by their respective copyright holders.

extension.description:
Port of FCEUmm to Libretro. FCEUmm emulates NES, Famicom, and Famicom Disk System (FDS). FCEUmm merges elements from FCEU Ultra, FCEU rerecording, FCEUXD, FCEUXDSP, FCEUXDSP CE, and FCEU-mm into a single branch of FCEU.
Icon credit: Anarkhya (anarkhya.deviantart.com)
Supported files: .fds, .nes, .unf, .unif

fMSX is a MSX emulator written by Marat Fayzullin. It emulates MSX, MSX2, and MSX2+ 8-bit home computers.
Supported files: .rom, .mx1, .mx2, .dsk, .cas

Fuse (the Free Unix Spectrum Emulator) was originally a ZX Spectrum emulator for Unix. It has since been ported to Mac OS X, Windows, the Wii, AmigaOS and MorphOS.
Supported files: .tzx, .tap, .z80, .rzx, .scl, .trd

Gambatte is an accuracy-focused, open-source, cross-platform Game Boy Color emulator written in C++.
Supported files: .gb, .gbc, .dmg
extension.disclaimer: Game Boy and Game Boy Color are registered trademarks of Nintendo of America, Inc. Gambatte is not affiliated with or endorsed by any of the companies mentioned.

extension.description:
An enhanced port of Genesis Plus to the libretro API. Support for SG-1000, Mark-III, Master System, Game Gear, Mega Drive & Mega CD hardware.
Special thanks to: twinaphex for backporting enhancements from the GX version (Gamecube/Wii port).
Supported files: .mdx, .md, .smd, .gen, .bin, .cue, .iso, .chd, .sms, .gg, .sg

GW is a Game & Watch simulator.
Supported files: .mgw

Handy is an Atari Lynx emulator by K. Wilkins for Windows 95/98/NT/2000/XP.
Supported files: .lnx, .o

Hatari is an Atari ST/STE/TT/Falcon emulator. Hatari tries to emulate the hardware as close as possible for greater compatibility. Because of this, it may be slower than less accurate emulators.
Supported files: .ST, .MSA, .ZIP, .STX, .DIM, .IPF, .M3U
Supported files: .zip, .ZIP
Supported files: .zip
Supported files: .zip
Supported files: .zip, .chd, .7z
Arcade (MAME 2014) Add-on removed
Supported files: .chd, .cmd, .zip, .7z
Supported files: .zip, .chd, .7z, .cmd
Supported files: .nes, .fds, .unf, .unif

mGBA aims to be faster and more accurate than many existing Game Boy Advance emulators, as well as adding features that other emulators lack.
Supported files: .gba, .gb, .gbc

Mr.Boom is a freeware 8 players Bomberman clone.
Supports up to 8 players and features like pushing bombs, remote controls and kangaroo riding...

Nestopia is a portable open source NES/Famicom emulator. It is designed to be as accurate as possible and supports a large number of peripherals. The hardware is emulated at cycle-by-cycle granularity, ensuring full support for software that does mid-scanline and other timing trickery.
Icon credit: Anarkhya (anarkhya.deviantart.com)
Supported files: .nes, .fds, .unf, .unif

NXEngine is a complete open-source clone/rewrite of the masterpiece jump-and-run platformer Doukutsu Monogatari (also known as Cave Story).
Supported files: .exe

O2EM is an Odyssey / VideoPac emulator.
Place "o2rom.bin" (required) in your userdata folder.
Supported files: .bin

PCSX ReARMed is another PCSX fork based on the PCSX-Reloaded project, which itself contains code from PCSX, PCSX-df and PCSX-Revolution. This version features a MIPS->ARM recompiler, NEON GTE code and more performance improvements.
Supported files: .bin, .cue, .img, .mdf, .pbp, .toc, .cbn, .m3u, .chd

extension.platforms: Genesis|Game Gear|SEGA Master System|Sega CD|Megadrive|Mega CD

extension.description:
Picodrive is yet another Megadrive / Genesis / Sega CD / Mega CD / 32X / SMS emulator heavily optimized for ARM.
Authors: Dave (aka fdave, finalburn author) and notaz
Supported files: .bin, .gen, .smd, .md, .32x, .cue, .iso, .sms

PokeMini emulates the obscure Pokmon Mini handheld. While functional, it does not support color files or savestates currently.
To include real BIOS, place "bios.min" in the emulator's userdata folder.
Supported files: .min

PrBoom is a version of the classic 3D shoot'em'up game Doom, originally written by id Software.
To play PrBoom, you need one of the main Doom data files (called the IWAD) from id Software - doom.wad, doom2.wad, tnt.wad or plutonia.wad - or the shareware doom1.wad.
If you don't own any of the Doom games, get the shareware doom1.wad from doom19s.zip on Doomworld's shareware download page. http://www.doomworld.com/files/shareware.shtml
Additionally it needs the prboom.wad from https://github.com/libretro/libretro-prboom/raw/master/prboom.wad copied to the game directory.
Supported files: .wad, .iwad, .pwad, .lmp

ProSystem is an Atari 7800 emulator.
Place "7800 BIOS (U).rom" (optional) in the emulator's userdata folder.
Supported files: .a78, .bin

The QuickNES core library, originally by Shay Green, heavily modified. QuickNES is a newer emulator that seems to have good compatibility.
Supported files: .nes

SameBoy is an open source Gameboy (DMG) and Gameboy Color (CGB) emulator, written in portable C.
Supported files: .gb, .gbc

ScummVM is a collection of game engine recreations. ScummVM emulates several systems, including the SCUMM system for LucasArts adventure games.
Supported files: .scummvm

Snes9x is a portable, freeware SNES and Super Famicom emulator. Snes9x is coded in C++, with three assembler CPU emulation cores on the i386 Linux and Windows ports.
Icon credit: HarryBana (harrybana.deviantart.com)
Supported files: .smc, .sfc, .swc, .fig, .bs
extension.disclaimer: The Snes9X team is not connected or affiliated with any mentioned company in any way. The opinions of the Snes9X team do not reflect the views of the various companies mentioned here. Companies and all products pertaining to that company are trademarks of that company. Please contact that company for trademark and copyright information.

extension.description:
Port of SNES9x 1.39 for libretro (was previously called PocketSNES). Heavily optimized for ARM.
Supported files: smc, fig, sfc, gd3, gd7, dx2, bsx, swc, zip

Port of Snes9x 1.52+ to Libretro (previously called SNES9x Next). Rewritten in C and several optimizations and speedhacks.
Icon credit: HarryBana (harrybana.deviantart.com)
Supported files: .smc, .fig, .sfc, .gd3, .gd7, .dx2, .bsx, .swc

Stella is a multi-platform Atari 2600 VCS emulator. The Atari 2600 Video Computer System (VCS), introduced in 1977, was the most popular home video game system of the early 1980's.
Stella was originally developed for Linux by Bradford W. Mott, and is currently maintained by Stephen Anthony.
Supported files: .a26, .bin

extension.summary: Nintendo - Game Boy / Color (TGB Dual) v0.8.3
extension.description:
TGB Dual is an open source GB/GBC emulator with game link cable support.
Supported files: .gb, .gbc, .sgb

Tyr-Quake is a branch of the Quake source code released by id. It's intended to support Quake and Quakeworld while fixing little bugs that have come up over the years.
Supported files: .pak

UAE stands for the Ubiquitous Amiga Emulator.
Most games require a version of the Amiga Kickstart ROM. However, some old games will work with the built-in ROM emulation.
Supported files: .adf, .adz, .dms, .fdi, .ipf, .hdf, .hdz, .lha, .cue, .ccd, .nrg, .mds, .iso, .uae, .m3u, .zip
UAE stands for the Ubiquitous Amiga Emulator. UAE4ARM is optimized for Android and the Raspberry Pi.

extension.summary: Nintendo - Game Boy Advance (VBA Next) v1.0.2
extension.description:
VBA-Next is a fork from the now inactive VisualBoy Advance project, with goals to improve the compatibility and features of the emulator.
Supported files: .gba

VBA-M is a Nintendo Game Boy and Game Boy Advance emulator based on the official VisualBoyAdvance by Forgotten and the VBA development team.
Supported files: .dmg, .gb, .gbc, .cgb, .sgb, .gba

Vecx is a Vectrex video game system emulator. It can run most Vectrex software.
Written by Richard Bannister.
Supported files: .bin, .vec

VICE stands for the Versatile Commodore Emulator. The current version emulates the C64, the C64DTV, the C128, the VIC20, practically all PET models, the PLUS4 and the CBM-II (aka C610/C510).
Supported files: .d64, .d71, .d80, .d81, .d82, .g64, .g41, .x64, .t64, .tap, .prg, .p00, .crt, .bin, .zip, .gz, .d6z, .d7z, .d8z, .g6z, .g4z, .x6z, .cmd, .m3u, .vfl

Virtual Jaguar is an emulator for the Atari Jaguar video game console.
Based on code released by David Raingeard (Cal2) of what used to be Potato Emulation.
Supported files: .j64, .jag
Test rendering to VRAM by drawing a simple checkerboard pattern.

Yabause stands for Yet Another Buggy And Uncomplete Saturn Emulator. Yabause can boot Sega Saturn bios and games, some of which are playable.
Icon credit: Anarkhya (anarkhya.deviantart.com)
Supported files: .cue, .iso, .mds, .ccd, .zip, .chd

High Efficiency Image File Format (HEIF) is a file format employing HEVC (h.265) image coding for the best compression ratios currently possible.
Support for this is provided by ISO/IEC 23008-12:2017 compliant libheif.
An addon to decode MPO (multiple picture object) files. These are used mainly for 3D cameras and the Nintendo 3DS.
libraw based image decoder

extension.description: InputStream client for adaptive streams
Cliente InputStream para flujo de datos adaptativos

extension.description:
The Real Time Messaging Protocol (RTMP) is a proprietary network protocol developed by Adobe Inc. to transmit audio, video and other data over the Internet from a media server to a flash player.
This addon implements RTMP streaming support for Kodi and installed add-ons.

This driver enables input from the X-Arcade Tankstick.
A udev rule is needed. See https://kodi.wiki/view/Tankstick

Ovaj softver je nestabilan! Autori ni na koji nain nisu odgovorni za neuspela snimanja, neispravne tajmere, izgubljene sate, ili bilo koje druge neeljene efekte...
Upphovsmnnen r inte ansvariga fr misslyckade inspelningar, inkorrekta timers, bortslsade timmar, eller ngra andra onskade effekter..
To je niystabilny softwer! Autry niy sm dpedzialne za niypodarzne graniy, niynlene godziny EPG, stracne godziny i inksze niychciane efekty.
Bu kararsz bir yazlmdr! Yapmclar hatal kaytlardan, bozuk srelerden, harcanan vakitten veya herhangi bir olumsuz etkiden dolay sorumlu tutulamaz.

Frontal de Filmon. s compatible amb la TV en directe, enregistraments, guia electrnica de programaci (EPG). Requereix una subscripci a Filmon. Abans d'activar: (a) En Filmon, configureu els canals com a preferits per veure'ls a Kodi (b) Configureu aquest complement amb el vostre usuari i contrasenya. Nota: Els enregistraments poden trigar diversos minuts a aparixer desprs de finalitzar-se el comptador.

Rozhran Filmon. Podporuje iv vysln, nahrvn, televizn program. Vyaduje pedplatn Filmon. Ped povolenm: (a) nastavte ve Filmonu kanly jako oblben, abyste je vidli v Kodi (b) zadejte sv uivatelsk jmno a heslo v nastaven tohoto doplku. Poznmka: nahrvky se mohou objevit a za nkoli minut po dokonen asovae.

Blaen Filmon. Mae'n cynnal teledu byw, recordiadau, a chanllawiau rhaglenni electronig. Bydd angen tanysgrifiad Filmon. Cyn ei alluogi: (a) yn Filmon mae angen gosod sianeli yn ffefrynnau i'w gweld nhw yn Kodi (b) rhowch eich enw defnyddiwr a chyfrinair yng ngosodiadau'r ychwanegyn. Sylwer: gall recordiad gymryd rhai munudau i ymddangos wedi i'r amserydd gwblhau ei waith.

Ennen kyttnottoa: (a) Aseta suosikkikanavasi Filmonissa (b) syt kyttjnimesi ja salasanasi tmn lisosan asetuksiin. Huom! Tallennukset saattavat ilmesty vasta monta minuuttia tallennuksen pttymisen jlkeen.

Note : en fin de minuterie, les enregistrements peuvent prendre plusieurs minutes avant dapparatre.

Napomena: snimanjima je potrebno nekoliko minuta da se pojave nakon to je zakazno vrijeme snimanja zavrilo.

Megjegyzs: a felvtelek befejezse utn elfordulhat hogy csak egy id mlva jelennek meg a felvteli listban.

Catatan : rekaman bisa memerlukan beberapa menit untuk muncul setelah timer selesai

Filmon-framendi. Styur beinar tsendingar, upptkur, rafrnar dagskrrupplsingar. arfnast Filmon-skriftar. ur en gerir virkt: (a) Filmon, settu rsir sem eftirlti til a sj r Kodi. (b) settu inn notandanafn itt og lykilor uppsetningu vibtarinnar. Taktu eftir: a getur teki nokkrar mntur anga til upptaka verur snileg eftir a upptku lkur.

Prie jungiant: (a) Filmon puslapyje nustatykite kanalus, kuriuos norite matyti Kodi, kaip mgstamiausius (b) veskite savo vartotojo vard ir slaptaod io priedo nustatymuose. Pastaba: raymo atsiradimui gali prireikti keleto minui po laikmaio sukrimo.

Filmon galasistma. Atbalsta tieraides TV, ierakstus, EPG. Nepiecieams Filmon konts. Pirms ieslganas: (a) iek Filmon iestatt kanlus favortos, lai tos redztu Kodi (b) ierakstt savu lietotju un paroli pielikuma iestatjumos. Perhatian: rakaman mengambil masa beberapa minit untuk muncul selepas pemasa selesai.

Filmon klient. Sttter direkte-TV, opptak, EPG. Krever abonnement hos Filmon. Fr aktivering: (a) sett kanaler som favoritter p Filmon for se de i Kodi. (b) skriv inn brukernavn og passord innstillingene til denne utvidelsen. Merk at det kan ta flere minutter fr et opptak vises i listen etter at nedtellingen er ferdig.

Filmon-frontend. Ondersteunt live-TV, opnamen en EPG. Vereist een Filmon-inschrijving. Voordat je inschakelt: (a) in Filmon stel kanalen in als favoriet om ze te zien in Kodi (b) voer je gebruikersnaam en -wachtwoord in in de add-oninstellingen. PS: opnamen kunnen meerdere minuten duren voordat ze worden getoond nadat de timer is afgelopen.

Klient telewizji dla FilmOn obsuguje transmisj kanaw telewizyjnych, nagrywanie oraz funkcje przewodnika telewizyjnego. Wymaga patnej subskrypcji usug FilmOn. (b) Ange ditt anvndarnamn och lsenord i instllningar fr detta tillgg. Observera: Det kan ta flera minuter innan inspelningar visas efter att timern r klar.

extension.description: IPTV Archive PVR klint ondersteun M3U speellyste, stroom van lewendige TV vir multisaai / unisaai bronne, luister na radio kanale en EPG.

Client senzill per a IPTV PVR compatible amb les llistes de reproducci m3u, transmissions en lnia de TV en directe per als orgens difusi nica o mltiple, escolta d'emissores de rdio i guia electrnica de programaci (EPG).
Jednoduch klient PVR pro IPTV podporuje seznamy stop m3u, streamovn ivho vysln pro zdroje vcesmrovho nebo jednosmrovho vysln, poslech rozhlasovch stanic a televizn program.
Mae Cleient IPTV Archive PVR yn cynnal rhestrau m3u, ffrydio Teledu Byw o ffynonellau darlledu eang ac unigol, gwrando ar sianeli Radio ac Amserlen Rhaglenni.
IPTV Simpel PVR klient understttelse M3U-afspilningslister, streaming af direkte tv til multicast/unicast kilder, lytte til radio kanaler og EPG.
IPTV Archive PVR Client untersttzt m3u Wiedergabelisten, Streaming von Live TV fr Multicast/Unicast Quellen, Radiosender und EPG.
PVR IPTV, m3u, Live TV / , EPG.
IPTV Archive PVR Client support m3u playlists, streaming of Live TV for multicast/unicast sources, listening to Radio channels and EPG.

IPTV Archive PVR Client support m3u playlists, streaming of Live TV for multicast/unicast sources, listening to Radio channels and EPG.
For documentation visit: https://github.com/kodi-pvr/pvr.iptvsimple/blob/Leia/README.md
IPTV Archive PVR Client support m3u playlists, streaming of Live TV for multicast/unicast sources, listening to Radio channels and EPG.
IPTV Archive PVR Client support m3u playlists, streaming of Live TV for multicast/unicast sources, listening to Radio channels and EPG.
Cliente simple PVR IPTV. Reproduce de TV en Vivo multicast/unicast y listas m3u8 . reproduce tambien canales de radio y GEP
El cliente PVR IPTV Archive soporta listas M3U, reproduccin de TV en Vivo para origenes multicast/unicast, escucha de canales de radio y EPG
IPTV Archive PVR Client soporta listas de reproduccin m3u, streaming de Live TV para fuentes multicast / unicast, escuchando para canales de radio y EPG.
IPTV-lisosa tukee m3u-toistolistoja, multicast/unicast-tv-lhetysten toistoa, radiokanavia ja ohjelmaopasta.

Client de numriscope simple pour IPTV, prenant en charge les listes de lecture m3u, la diffusion en continu des tls en direct pour les sources de multidiffusion et de monodiffusion, lcoute de chanes radio, et le GP.

Le client enregistreur vido (PVR) IPTV Archive gre les listes de lecture M3U, la diffusion en continu de la TV en direct en mono ou multidiffusion, l'coute des chanes radio et le guide lectronique des programmes TV.
O cliente PVR simple de IPTV soporta listaxes m3u, transmisin de TV en directo para fontes multicast/unicast, escoita de canles de Radio e Gua.
IPTV Archive m3u, / , .
IPTV Archive PVR klijent podrava m3u popise izvoenja, streamanje TV programa s vie ili jednog izvora, sluanje radio programa i elektronski programski vodi (EPG).
Az IPTV PVR kiegszt tmogatja m3u listk lejtszst, l TV adsok hlzati streamelst, rdiadk hallgatst EPG adatok kezelsvel.
IPTV, klien PTV sederhana yang mendukung playlist m3u, pengaliran siaran TV langsung untuk sumber multicast/unicast, mendengarkan radio dan EPG.
Einfaldur upptkubilari fyrir IPTV sem styur m3u spilunarlista, streymingu af beinum tsendingum fr multicast/unicast jnustum, hlustun tvarpsrsir og rafrna dagskrrvsa
Il client IPTV Archive PVR supporta playlist m3u, streaming della Live TV per sorgenti multicast/unicast e ascoltare canali Radio ed EPG.
IPTV PVR m3u / TV EPG
IPTV Archive PVR m3u , , / TV , EPG .
IPTV Archive PVR klientas palaiko m3u grojaraius, TV transliacijas i multicast/unicast altini, radijo stoi transliacijas ir EPG.
IPTV vienkrais PVR klients atbalsta m3u spsarakstus, tieraides TV straumanu multiraides/uniraides avotiem, radio kanlu klausanos un EPG.
IPTV Archive PVR Client m3u , Live TV multicast/unicast , EPG.
Klien PVR IPTV Archive menyokong senarai audio visual m3u, penstriman TV Langsung untuk sumber satu siaran/berbilang-siaran, mendengar saluran Radio dan EPG.
IPTV Archive PVR Client jifla gal playlists m3u, streaming ta' TV Lajv gal sorsi multicast/unicast, smieg ta' stazzjonijiet tar-Radju u EPG.
IPTV Archive PVR-klient sttter m3u-spillelister, strmming av direkte-TV, lytting til radiokanaler og programguider.
IPTV Archive PVR clint ondersteunt m3u-afspeellijsten, streaming van live-TV voor multicast/unicastbronnen, luisteren naar radiozenders en EPG.
Klient telewizji dla telewizji internetowej obsuguje listy odtwarzania m3u, transmisj kanaw radiowych i telewizyjnych ze rde punktowych i grupowych oraz funkcje przewodnika telewizyjnego.
O cliente de PVR IPTV Archive Client oferece suporte para listas m3u, transmisso de TV ao vivo de fontes multicast/unicast, transmisso de rdios e, ainda, suporte a guia de programao eletrnico - EPG.
Cliente IPTV Archive PVR com suporte a listas de reproduo m3u, transmisso de TV em direto de fontes multidifuso/unidifuso, ouvir estaes de rdio e EPG.
PVR Client IPTV suporta liste m3u, redare TV n direct pentru surse de multicast/unicast, ascultare canale radio si EPG.
IPTV. / , .
Jednoduch IPTV PVR klient podporuje mp3 zoznamy sborov, streamovanie ivho televzneho vysielania ako multicast/unicast zdroje, povanie rozhlasovch kanlov a EPG.
IPTV Archive odjemalec PVR podpira sezname m3u, pretakanja TV v ivo za vire multicast/unicast, posluenje radijskih postaj in EPG.
IPTV PVR m3u , multicast/unicast , EPG.
IPTV Jednostavan PVR Klijent podrava m3u liste za reprodukciju, strimovanje TV Uivo za multicast/unicast izvore, sluanje Radio kanala i EPG.
IPTV Archive PVR Client stder m3u-spellistor, strmmande Live-TV fr multicast/unicast-kllor, radiolyssning och EPG.
Klijynt telewizyje dl telewizyje internetowyj bsuguje wykzy dtwrzani m3u, szpricowanie kanaw radyjowych i telewizyjnych ze rde pnktowych i skupinowych, a ty fnkcyje EPG.
IPTV Basit PVR stemcisi m3u alma listeleri, multicast/unicast kaynaklar iin Canl TV ak, radyo kanallarn dinleme ve EPG destekler.
IPTV PVR m3u /
IPTV Archive PVR m3u multicast/unicast

extension.description: MediaPortal TV Bediener voorprogram. Ondersteun stroom van Lewendige TV & Opnames, luister na Radio kanale, EPG en Tydhouers. Hierdie byvoegsel kombineer die voormalige ffmpeg en tsreader byvoegsels.
MediaPortal TV Server frontend. Supports streaming of Live TV & Recordings, listening to Radio channels, EPG and Timers. This addon combines the former ffmpeg and tsreader addons.
MediaPortal. , , .

MediaPortal TV Server frontend. Soporta streaming de TV y grabaciones en vivo, escucha de canales de radio, EPG y temporizadores.
MediaPortal TV serveri esi. Toetab telekanalite striimimist ja salvestamist, raadio kuulamist ja elektroonilist saatekava. See lisa kombineerib endas endised ffmpeg ja tsreader lisad.

Frontale pour le serveur tl MediaPortal, prenant en charge la diffusion en continu des tls en direct et les enregistrements, lcoute de chanes radio, le GP et les minuteries.

Interface logicielle pour le serveur TV de MediaPortal. Il gre la lecture et l'enregistrement en continu de la TV en direct, l'coute de radios, le guide lectronique des programmes TV et les programmations.

Interface do Servidor de TV de MediaPortal. Soporta transmisin de TV en directo e Gravacins, escoita de canles de radio, Gua e programacins. Este complemento combina o antigo ffmpeg e os complementos tsreader.
MediaPortal. , , . FFmpeg TSReader.

MediaPortal TV posluitelj suelje. Podrava stremanje i snimanje TV programa, sluanje radio programa, elektronski programski vodi (EPG) i vremenski zadano snimanje. Ovaj dodatak objedinjuje nekadanje ffmpeg i tsreader dodatke.
MediaPortal TV kiszolgl eltt. l adsok, felvtelek s rdiadsok tmogatsa EPG-vel s idztssel. Ez a kiegszt egyesti az ffmpeg, s a tsreader kiegsztket.
Frontend Server TV MediaPortal. Mendukung pengaliran TV dan Rekaman langsung, mendengarkan kanal radio, EPG dan Timer. Pengaya ini mengkombinasikan penggaya ffmeg dan tsreader yang lama.
Framendi fyrir MediaPortal TV. Styur streymingu beinum tsendingum og upptkum, hlustun tvarpsrsum, rafrnum sjnvarpsvsum (EPG) og tmatku. essi vibk sameinar fyrri vibtur fyrir ffmpeg og tsreader

MediaPortal TV EPG ffmpeg tsreader
MediaPortal TV Server . TV & , , EPG . ffmpeg tsreader .

MediaPortal TV Server galasistma. Atbalsta tieraides TV un ierakstu straumanu, radio kanlu klausanos, EPG un taimerus. is pielikums kombin senkos ffmpeg un tsreader pielikumus.
MediaPortal TV Server frontend. Supports streaming of Live TV & Recordings, listening to Radio channels, EPG and Timers. This addon combines the former ffmpeg and tsreader addons.

MediaPortal TV-tjenerdrakt. Sttter strmming av direkte-TV og opptak, Lytting til radiokanaler, EPG og tidsur. Dette tillegget kombinererer de tidligere ffmpeg- og tsreader -tilleggene.
MediaPortal TV Server frontend. Ondersteunt het bekijken van Live-TV en opnames, het beluisteren van radiozenders, het tonen van de EPG en het inplannen/beheren van nieuwe opnames (Timers).

Klient telewizyjny dla MediaPortal obsuguje transmisje kanaw radiowych i telewizyjnych, nagrywanie i harmonogram nagra oraz funkcje przewodnika telewizyjnego. Klient ten czy w sobie funkcje wczeniejszych klientw ffmpeg i tsreader.
Frontend do Servidor de TV do MediaPortal. Suporta streaming de TV Ao Vivo e Gravaes, escutar canais de rdio, EPG e Agendamentos. Este addon combina os antigos addons ffmpeg e tsreader
Interface para o servidor MediaPortal TV. Suporta transmisso de TV em direto e gravaes, ouvir estaes de Rdio, EPG e Temporizadores. Este add-on combina os antigos add-ons ffmpeg e tsreader.
Partea din fa pentru servitorul tv MediaPortal. Capabil de difuzarea televiunii n direct i a nregistrrilor, ascultarea canalelor Radio channels, ghid tv electronic i cronometre.
Kodi - MediaPortal. , , EPG . ffmpeg tsreader.

Rozhranie pre MediaPortal TV server. Podporuje streamovanie ivho televzneho vysielania a nahrvok, povanie rozhlasovch kanlov, EPG a asovae. Tento doplnok zluuje dohromady bval doplnky ffmpeg a tsreader.
Vmesnik za MediaPortal TV strenik. Podpira pretakanje televizije v ivo & posnetkov, posluanje radia, EPG in asovnike. Ta dodatek zdruuje prejnja dodatka ffmpeg in tsreader.
MediaPortal . & , , EPG .
MediaPortal TV Server interfejs. Podrava strimovanje TV Uivo & Snimaka, sluanje Radio kanala, EPG i Tajmere.
MediaPortal tv-server frontend. Stdjer strmning av Live-TV & inspelningar, lyssna p radiokanaler, EPG och timers.
MediaPortal TV Sunucusu n ucu. Canl TV ak ve kayt yapabilme, radyo kanallar dinleme, EPG ve zamanlayclar destekler. Bu eklenti eski ffmpeg ve tsreader eklentilerini birletirir.
MediaPortal. Live TV , , . ffmpeg tsreader.
Giao tip cho MediaPortal TV Server. H tr truyn pht v thu chng trnh Live TV, nghe Radio, hn gi v hin th lch trnh chiu (EPG). Addon ny kt hp cho cc addon c ca ffmpeg v tsreader.

Dan il-programm mhuwiex stabbli! L-Awturi m'humiex responsabbli bl-ebda mod gal rekordings li ma jirnexxewx, arloi baljati, siegat molija, jew kwalunkwe effett ieor mhux mixtieq.
Dette er ustabil programvare! Skaperen har ikke p noen mte ansvar for feilede opptak, uriktige tidsur, bortkastede timer, eller andre unskede effekter..
Dit is instabiele software! De makers zijn op geen enkele wijze verantwoordelijk voor foutieve opnames, incorrecte timers, verloren uren, of andere ongewenste bijverschijnselen.

Oprogramowanie nadal jest w fazie rozwoju i jest niestabilne! Autorzy w aden sposb nie s odpowiedzialni za nieudane nagrania, bdy w harmonogramie nagra, zmarnowany czas ani jakiekolwiek inne niepodane efekty.
Este um software instvel! Os autores no so responsveis por falhas nas gravaes, agendamentos incorretos, horas dispendidas, ou quaisquer outros efeitos indesejveis
Este software instvel! Os autores no podem ser responsabilizados por gravaes falhadas, temporizadores incorretos, horas desperdiadas ou qualquer outro tipo de efeitos indesejveis...
Acesta nu este o aplicaie definitiv! Autorii nu sunt n nici un fel responsabili pentru nregistrri euate, cronometre incorecte, ore pierdute, sau orice alte efecte nedorite...
Tento softvr nie je stabiln! Autori nenes iadnu zodpovednos za chybn nahrvky vysielania, nesprvne asovae alebo in neelan udalosti spsoben tmto softvrom..
To je nestabilna programska oprema! Avtorji niso odgovorni za neuspela snemanja, nepravilne asovnike, zapravljen as in katerikoli drug neelen uinek...
Ky program nuk sht ende stabl! Autort e ktij programi nuk jan n as nj menyr prgjegjs pr rregistrime t gabuara, timer t pasakt, koh t humbur ose efekte t tilla t padshirueshme.
Ovaj softver je nestabilan! Autori ni na koji nain nisu odgovorni za neuspela snimanja, neispravne tajmere, izgubljene sate, ili bilo koje druge neeljene efekte.
Detta r instabil mjukvara! Upphovsmnnen r inte ansvariga fr misslyckade inspelningar, inkorrekta timers, bortslsade timmar, eller ngra andra onskade effekter..
To je niystabilny softwer! Autry niy sm dpedzialne za niypodarzne graniy, niynlene godziny EPG, stracne godziny i inksze niychciane efekty.
Bu kararsz bir yazlmdr! Yapmclar hatal kaytlardan, bozuk srelerden, harcanan vakitten veya herhangi bir olumsuz etkiden dolay sorumlu tutulamaz.

extension.description: Hierdie is 'n PVR byvoegsel om met VBox Communications' XTi TV Gateways te koppel. Dit ondersteun al die basiese funksionaliteit wat jy sal verwag, soos kyk, opneem en tydskuif. Addisioneel ondersteun dit die aanvul van die oor-die-lug gids data met eksterne XMLTV data.
XTi TV Gateway VBox Communications. , , : , . , , , , XMLTV.

Toto je doplnk PVR addon pro propojen s VBox Communications' XTi TV Gateways. Podporuje vechny zkladn funkce, kter byste oekvali, jako je sledovn, nahrvn a asov posun. Navc podporuje rozen vzduchem ench dat televiznho programu o extern data XMLTV.

Dette er et PVR addon, der kommunikerer med VBox Communications' XTi TV Gateways. Det understtter alle simple funktioner, s som at se, optage og tidsforskydelse. Derudover, understtter det over-the-air tv-guide data med eksternt XMLTV data.

Mit diesem Addon ist es mglich sich mit VBox Kommunikation XTiTv Zugngen zu verbinden. Es untersttzt dabei die Grundeinstellungen, wie anschauen, Aufnahme und Timeshift. Zustzlich wird das vergrern der Over the air Programmdaten mit externen XMLTV Daten untersttzt.
PVR VBox ' XTi TV Gateways . , , timeshifting . , over-the-air XMLTV .

This is a PVR addon for interfacing with VBox Communications' XTi TV Gateways. It supports all the basic functionality you would expect, such as watching, recording and timeshifting. Additionally, it supports augmenting the over-the-air guide data with external XMLTV data.

This is a PVR addon for interfacing with VBox Communications' XTi TV Gateways. It supports all the basic functionality you would expect, such as watching, recording and timeshifting. Additionally, it supports augmenting the over-the-air guide data with external XMLTV data.

This is a PVR addon for interfacing with VBox Communications' XTi TV Gateways. It supports all the basic functionality you would expect, such as watching, recording and timeshifting. Additionally, it supports augmenting the over-the-air guide data with external XMLTV data.

Este es un addon PVR que sirve como interfaz para Comunicaciones con puertas de enlace XTi TV. Soporta toda la funcionalidad bsica, por ejemplo, ver, grabar y timeshift. Adicionalmente, da da soporte adicional a la gua OTA con datos externos XMLTV.

Este es un complemento PVR para la interfaz con las pasarelas XTi TV de VBox Communications. Soporta todas las funciones bsicas que se esperan, como ver, grabar y cambiar de tiempo. Adems, soporta el aumento de los datos de gua de sobre el aire con datos XMLTV externos.

Tm PVR-lisosa on tarkoitettu kytettvksi VBox Communications XTi -laitteiden kanssa. Se tukee kaikkia perusominaisuuksia, kuten tv-lhetysten katsomista, tallentamista ja ajansiirtoa. Lisksi se tukee XMLTV-formaatissa olevia ohjelmatietoja.

Ceci est un addiciel de numriscope assurant linterface avec les passerelles XTi TV de VBox Communications. Il prend en charge toutes les fonctions de base que vous pourriez attendre, telles que regarder, enregistrer, ainsi que le dcalage temporel. De plus, il prend en charge laugmentation des donnes du guide tldiffus avec les donnes XMLTV.

Ceci est une extension d'enregistreur vido (PVR) s'interfaant avec les passerelles TV XTi de VBox Communications. L'extension permet les fonctionnalits attendues de base, comme le visionnage, l'enregistrement et le diffr. De plus, elle propose d'ajouter des donnes externes XMLTV au guide lectronique des programmes TV diffus.

Este engadido un PVR para interactuar con gateways de VBox Communications' XTi TV. Soporte todas as funcionalidades bsicas que poderas agardar, como ver, gravar e mudar o tempo. A maiores, tamn permite aumentar a gua en directo con datos externos XMLTV.
XTi TV Gateways VBox Communications. , . XMLTV .

Ovo je PVR dodatak za interakciju s VBox Communications' XTi TV pristupnicima. Podrava osnovne funkcije koje su vam potrebne, poput gledanja, snimanja i premotavanja. Dodatno, podrava proirenje EPG vodia s dodatnim XMLTV podacima.

Ez a PVR kiegszt sszekti a VBox Communications' XTi TV beltri egysggel. Tmogatja az alap funkcikat ami elvrhat, gymint ads, felvtel s cssztatott felvtel. Tmogatja mg az elektronikus msorjsgot, az ads eltt kiegsztve az XMLTV adatokkal.

Ini adalah addon PVR untuk berinteraksi dengan VBox Communications 'XTi TV Gateway. Mendukung semua fungsi dasar yang Anda harapkan, seperti menonton, merekam dan timeshifting. Selain itu, menambah dukungan panduan data melalui-the-air dengan data XMLTV eksternal.

etta er upptku-vibt til a tengjast VBox Communications' XTi TV Gateways. Hn styur allar grunnagerir sem gerir r fyrir, eins og a horfa , taka upp og tmaflakk. A auki styur a a bta vi dagskrrvsinn, sem kemur gegnum loftneti, upplsingum fr tvrum XMLTV ggnum.

Questo un Add-on PVR per interfacciarsi con i Gateway XTi TV di VBox Communications. Supporta tutte le funzionalit base che ti aspetti, come guardare, registrare e mettere in pausa. In pi, supporta l'integrazione dei dati della guida via radio con dati esterni XMLTV.
VBox Communications XTi TV PVR . , . Over-the-air XMLTV .

Tai yra PVR priedas, skirtas susieti su VBox Communications' XTi TV tinkl sietuvais. Jis palaiko visus pagrindinius funkcionalumus, kuri galite tiktis, tokius kaip irjimas, raymas ir laiko paslinkimas. Papildomai jis palaiko oru perduodamus gido duomenis su ioriniais XMLTV duomenimis.

is ir PVR pielikums saskarnei ar VBox Communications XTi TV vrtejm. Tas atbalsta visu pamata funkcionalitti, ko vartu sagaidt, piemram, skatanos, ierakstanu, laika nobdi. Piedevm tas atbalsta pa gaisu saemtu datu papildinanu ar rjiem XMLTV datiem.

Ia adalah tambahan PVR untuk pengantaramukaan dengan VBox Communications' XTi TV Gateways. Ia menyokong semua kefungsian asas yang anda jangkakan, seperti menonton, merakam dan anjak masa. Selain itu, ia menyokong augmentasi menerusi data panduan ke-udara dengan data XMLTV luaran.

Dette er en PVR-utvidelse for grensesnitt med VBox Kommunikasjons'XTI TV Gateways. Den sttter all grunnleggende forventet funksjonalitet, som se p, opptak og tidsforskyving. I tillegg sttter den forsterkning av direktesendt guide-informasjon med ekstern XMLTV-informasjon.

Dit is een PVR addon voor verbinden met VBox communications XTi TV Gateways. Het ondersteunt alle basisfunctionaliteiten die je mag verwachten, zoals kijken, opnemen en tijdsprongen. Overig, het ondersteunt de over-the-air gidsdata met externe XML TV data.

Klient telewizji wsppracujcy z bramkami VBox Communications' XTi TV. Obsuguje transmisj kanaw telewizyjnych, nagrywanie oraz funkcje przewodnika telewizyjnego. Dodatkowo umoliwia rozszerzanie informacji przewodnika nadawanych razem z sygnaem telewizyjnych o informacje z zewntrznych rde XMLTV.

Este um addon de PVR para interface com Gateway do VBox Communications XtI TV. Suporta as funcionalidades bsicas que voc espera, como assistir, gravar e timeshifting. Adicionalmente, podes obter dados do guia Over-the-air ou dados externos via arquivo XMLTV.

O add-on de PVR um interface de comunicao da VBox s Gateways XTi TV. Suporta todas as funcionalidades bsicas esperadas pelo utilizador, tais como ver, gravar e ver mais tarde. Alm disso suporta o aumento do over-the-air de dados de programao externos com o XMLTV.

Acesta este un supliment PVR pentru conectarea cu receptoarele XTi ale celor de la VBox Communications. Suport toate funcionalitile de baz pe care le-ai atepta, cum este privirea, nregistrarea i decalajul temporal. Adiional, suport mbuntirea datelor ghidului venit prin aer cu cele dintr-un fiier XMLTV extern.
PVR VBox Communications' XTi TV Gateways. , . , XMLTV.

Toto je doplnok PVR urenn na prepojenie s brnami softvru VBox Communications XTi TV. Podporuje vetky zkladn funkcie ako je sledovanie vysielania, nahrvanie a posun v ase. Okrem toho podporuje aj rozirovanie dajov vzduchom renho sprievodcu o extern daje XMLTV.

To je dodatek PVR za komunikacijo s TV prehodi XTi podjetja VBox Communications. Podpira vse temeljne funkcionalnosti, ki jih priakujete, kot je gledanje, snemanje in asovni zamik. Poleg tega podpira bogatenje podatkov vodnika z zunanjimi podatki XMLTV.
PVR VBox Communications' XTi . , , . , over-the-air XMLTV .

Ovo je PVR dodatni program za povezivanje VBox Communications' XTi TV Mrenim Prolazima. Podrava sve osnovne funkcionalnosti koje biste oekivali, kao to je gledanje, snimanje i vremenski pomeraj. Dodatno, podrava uveanje over-the-air podataka vodia sa spoljanjim XMLTV podacima.

Detta r ett PVR-tillgg fr kommunikation med XTi TV-gateways frn VBox Communications. Det stder all frvntad grundlggande funktionalitet, som visning, inspelning och timeshift. Det stder dessutom frbttring av signalburen guidedata via extern XMLTV-data.

To je przidwka PVR do pojsrzedniczyni ze XTi TV Gateway d VBox Communications. Podpiyr wszyjske ajnfachowe funkcyje, kerych by szo czekiwa: bziyraniy, nagrywaniy, timeshifting. krm tego, d przidwani zewnyntrznych datw XMLTV podpiyr rozszyrzowanie EPG d dostwcy.

Bu, VBox Communications' XTi TV Gateways iin arabirim salayan bir PVR eklentisidir. zleme, kaydetme ve zaman kaydrma gibi, beklenecek tm temel ilevleri destekler. Ek olarak, harici XMLTV verileri ile yayn rehberi verilerinin glendirilmesini de destekler.l
PVR VBox XTi XMLTV OTA
VBox Communications' XTi TV Gateways PVR XMLTV

Ez nem stabil szoftver! A ksztk nem vllalnak felelssget, a hibs felvtelrt, rossz idztsrt, elvesztegetett idrt...
Ini merupakan software yang tidak stabil! Penulis tidak bertanggung jawab untuk rekaman gagal, timer salah, waktu terbuang, atau efek tak diinginkan lainnya...

To je nestabilna programska oprema! Avtorji niso odgovorni za neuspela snemanja, nepravilne asovnike, zapravljen as in katerikoli drug neelen uinek...
Ky program nuk sht ende stabil! Autort e ktij programi nuk jan n as nj menyr prgjegjs pr rregistrime t gabuara, timer t pasakt, koh t humbur ose efekte t tilla t padshirueshme.

Bu kararsz bir yazlmdr! Yapmclar hatal kaytlardan, bozuk srelerden, harcanan vakitten veya herhangi bir olumsuz etkiden dolay sorumlu tutulamaz.

v3.28.4 - Added: added new addon icon
v3.28.3 - Added: Epg lookup debug logging - When adding timer
v3.28.2 - Fixed: Use correct start time for EPG lookup when adding timer - Fixed: strncpy fix possible length fault
v3.28.1 - Update: Github README link in addon.xml for Leia
v3.28.0 - Added: Support for IPTV Streams configured on E2 device (no timeshifting) - Added: Reload instead of reconnecting when channel/group changes are detected - Added: Use truly unique IDs for channels so EPG changes are correctly reflected - Fixed: Only get drive space for devices that have an HDD - Fixed: use correct function to lookup group when adding - Added: update README.md to show appveyor/travis badges per branch - Added: Update OSX build script - Added: update badge status for travis/appveyor - Added: add copyright notices to files - Fixed: Fix default path for genre text mapping file
v3.27.1 - Update: Build sytem version - Added: AppVeyor for Windows related build tests - Fixed: Build depends search way
v3.27.0 - Added: Allow creation of epg based repeating timer rules if autotimers are not available
v3.26.0 - Added: Set program id option for streams with superfluous program data - Added: Undelete and trashcan (when configured on backend) for recordings - Added: Use new API for backend channel numbers - openwebif 1.3.7 - Fixed: Radio groups parsed from wrong api - Added: Support disabling addon debug logging in debug mode
v3.25.0 - Added: Support backend channel numbers for all channel groups not just the first - Added: Ignore empty channel groups - Added: Readme and help info updates - Fixed: Revert support hidden entries for backend channel numbers - Fixed: Fix hanging on deleting multiple recordings at once
v3.24.0 - Added: Custom Channel Groups, closes #209 - Added: Connection manager improvements - Added: Support hidden entries for backend channel numbers - Fixed: Timer descprition for providers who only use long descrption
v3.23.0 - Added: Support settings levels via the current kodi settings level - Added: Fallback EPG Entries for Timers - Added: Support backend channel numbers using Openwebif
v3.22.0 - Added: Help info for addon settings - Added: Delete child timers when deleting autotimers - Added: Set max connection check interval to 60 seconds - Fixed: Incorrect localisation IDs - Fixed: Timers in error state cause crash on delete - Added: Support show info fields for Timers
v3.21.0 - Added: Support Edit Recording name, last played and play count - Fixed: Use v3.6.1 of nlohmann/json to relax cmake version dependency for OSMC, fixes #194 - Added: Nightly channel reload check as default - Added: Split out and move openwebif version checking to settings
v3.20.0 - Added: Add options to Tune Async connection for slower E2 devices - Added: Enable option to reload channels and groups once per day if changes are detected - Added: Allow timers generated by autotimers to be deleted - Fixed: Fix for disabling timers - Added: Use genre from kodi for timers instead of lookup where possible - Added: Support recording type fully for TV/Radio/Any channel - Added: By default load Last Scanned group if no TV groups found - Fixed: Channel Service Refs Can sometimes have alphabetic characters appended at the end, fixes #202 - Added: For timers and autotimers without a valid channel put in error state instead of omitting - Fixed: IsRunning timer check not checking start time
v3.19.0 - Added: Async Connection - Reconnect if Enigma2 device was or becomes unavailable, closes #154, closes #184 - Added: Notify when Channel/ChannelGroups changes are detected, closes #179 - Added: Support genres for Recordings and Timers, fixes #186 - Fixed: Instant recordings may be missing show info depending on last EPG update, fixes #185 - Added: Helper build script for MacOSX
v3.18.1 - Fixed: Crash on addon start, fixes #191
v3.18.0 - Fixed: Ensure only one call to GetEPGForChannel happens at one time, fixes #181 - Added: Update/fix server version for pvr addon - Added: Option to skip initial EPG Load - Fixed: Fix for zap on channel change for dreamboxes - Added: Support for padding in certain timer types - Fixed: Change the call web/tunersignal to web/signal so it also works on DreamOS
v3.17.0 - Added: Recording EDL support - Added: Update Timer Types to display correctly in Manual vs EPG UIs - Added: Updated show info regex's - Fixed: Timer Recording not displaying description - Not being stored on STB - AddTimer Call, fixes #174 - Fixed: Fix for uncaught type_error for nlohmann/json - Fixed: Include TV Favourites channels by default in settings - Added: Support Last Scanned for both TV and Radio, fixes #178 - Fixed: Null pointer check for Genre EPG data processed XML
v3.16.2 - Fixed: Seg fault on shutdown - Timer Updates thread accessing released object, fixes #172 - Fixed: Incorrectly used time_t instead int64 in GetStreamTimes, fixes #171 - Added: Load Addon Version - Fixed: Clean up/partition addon debug log, fixes #159 - Added: Add user defined delay between EPG Channel Updates, fixes #158 - Added: Enable Trace Logging in debug mode - Added: Integrate Stream API details with Tuners - Fixed: JSON API requires version 1.3.5+ of OpenWebIf, fixes #169 - Added: updated language files from Transifex
v3.16.1 - Fixed: Backend polled too often for Signal Quality, fixes #165 - Fixed: SNR and Signal showing as zero in PVR info overlay, fixes #164 - Fixed: When playing a current recording duration at end time is wrong, fixes #160 - Fixed: Plugin won't load channels after upgrade to 3.16.0, fixes #161
v3.16.0 - Added: Tuners and SignalStatus - Added: Use Picon Path from OpenWebIf - Fixed: Change startup issue log statements from Debug to Error, fixes #157
v3.15.5 - Added: updated language files from Transifex
v3.15.4 - Fixed: In 3.15.2 WebIf that is not OpenWebIf does not support auto timer API - Addon won't load Newnigma2 image, fixes #151
v3.15.3 - Fixed: GetStreamTimes not implemented for Recordings, fixes #148 - Fixed: When starting a recording partway through start time is EPG start not recording start, fixes #147
v3.15.2 - Fixed: Only load Season info extractor and genre mappers config when enabled, fixes #136 - Fixed: 3.15.1 dont load/work on old DM800se, fixes #139 - Fixed: Missing default value from timeshift buffer path, fixes #140 - Fixed: Channel Group Member Order not preserved, fixes #141
v3.15.1 - Fixed: since 3.15.0 pvr manager cant start #134 - Added: Log Distro Version
v3.15.0 - Added: Support for Radio Groups - Added: Create unique list of channels instead of a copy of each channel per group, fixes #101 - Fixed: hdd free space is wrong, fixes #122 - Added: Device Settings - AutoTimer and Padding - Added: PowerstateMode on exit, fixes #128 - Fixed: Store timer state on update, fixes #131 - Fixed: Updates not occuring at specified time and immediate update on timer event, fixes #130 - Added: Support different update modes for timers and recordings, fixes #125
v3.14.0 - Added: Externalised season/episode and genre config to allow users support other formats/languages, closes #118 - Added: Server OpenWebIf version now reported by addon
v3.13.0 - Added: New setting to enable streaming over HTTPS - Added: New setting to enable authentication for streaming
v3.12.6 - Fixed: Windows build fix - Fixed: tsbuffer.ts never got deleted, fixes #115

extension.summary: LCDproc: Software to display system information from your Linux/*BSD box on a LCD
extension.description: LCDproc (e08546c13a4157ed98cd4a8e9086e7acd66f93c0) is a piece of software that displays real-time system information from your Linux/*BSD box on a LCD. The server supports several serial devices: Matrix Orbital, Crystal Fontz, Bayrad, LB216, LCDM001 (kernelconcepts.de), Wirz-SLI, Cwlinux(.com) and PIC-an-LCD; and some devices connected to the LPT port: HD44780, STV5730, T6963, SED1520 and SED1330. Various clients are available that display things like CPU load, system load, memory usage, uptime, and a lot more.

extension.summary: Docker is an open-source engine that automates the deployment of any application as a lightweight, portable, self-sufficient container that will run virtually anywhere.
extension.description: Docker containers can encapsulate any payload, and will run consistently on and between virtually any server. The same container that a developer builds and tests on a laptop will run at scale, in production*, on VMs, bare-metal servers, OpenStack clusters, public instances, or combinations of the above.

extension.summary: Inadyn: a small and simple Dynamic Domain Name System client
extension.description: Inadyn (2.5) is a small and simple Dynamic Domain Name System (DDNS) client with HTTPS support. It is commonly available in many GNU/Linux distributions, used in off-the-shelf routers and Internet gateways to automate the task of keeping your DNS record up to date with any IP address changes from your ISP. It can also be used in installations with redundant (backup) connections to the Internet.

extension.summary: tinc: a Virtual Private Network daemon
extension.description: tinc (1.1pre17) is a Virtual Private Network (VPN) daemon that uses tunnelling and encryption to create a secure private network between hosts on the Internet. Because the VPN appears to the IP level network code as a normal network device, there is no need to adapt any existing software. This allows VPN sites to share information with each other over the Internet without exposing any information to others.

extension.description:
This add-on uses the libarchive library to read a variety of archive and compression formats.
Supported formats are: 7z, tar.gz, tar.bz2, tar.xz, zip, rar, tgz, tbz2, gz, bz2, xz, cbr

Dieses Addon dient zum entpacken von RAR-Archiven.
Es ermglicht das direkte Lesen nicht komprimierter RAR-Dateien, sodass ein vorheriges Entpacken nicht erforderlich ist. Bei allen anderen Typen wird es vorbergehend entpackt und an Kodi bertragen.
Achtung: Der Archivtyp "Solid RAR" erfordert ein vollstndiges Entpacken, um die darin enthaltenen Dateien zu verwenden. Daher knnen die Zugriffszeiten fr grere Pakete lnger dauern.

This addon is an extraction utility for RAR archives.
It allows direct reading of uncompressed RAR files, so prior unpacking is not necessary. For all other types, it is temporarily unpacked and passed to Kodi.
Attention: A "Solid RAR" archive type requires complete unpacking to use files within it. Hence access times may be long for larger packages.
extension.disclaimer: Diese Version erfordert mindestens Kodi Leia 18.6; Bitte verwenden Sie 2.0.8 fr frhere Leia-Versionen
This version requires at least Kodi Leia 18.6; please use 2.0.8 for earlier Leia versions

extension.description:
This addon allows Kodi to read content from a Super Audio CD ISO image.
Super Audio CD (SACD) is a read-only optical disc format for audio storage, introduced in 1999, developed jointly by Sony and Philips Electronics to be the successor to the Compact Disc.
The SACD format offers more audio channels (e.g. surround sound), a higher bit rate, and longer playing time than a conventional CD.
extension.disclaimer: Playback seek is currently not possible.

extension.description:
The SSH File Transfer Protocol (also Secure File Transfer Protocol, or SFTP) is a network protocol that provides file access, file transfer, and file management over any reliable data stream.
This addon allows file access to data in it.

extension.description: Spectrum is 'n Visualisering wat 'n roterende 3D Spektrum Analiseerder, verbeeld met , vertoon wat op die maat van die musiek beweeg en 'n golf effek oor die spektrum rooster skep. Dit het ook verstellings vir die aanpas van spektrum staaf hoogte, sy spoed, en hoe die stawe verbeeld word (solied, punte, draad raamwerk) en is 'n lekker ligte, lae cpu verbruik visualisering wat fantasties lyk

Spectrum is a Visualisation showing a rotating 3D Spectrum Analyzer rendered in that moves to the beat of the music creating a wave effect across the spectrum grid. It also has settings to adjust the spectrum bar height, Its speed, and how the bars are rendered (solid, points, wire frame) and is a nice light weight, low cpu useage visualisation that looks great
Spectrum 3D ( ). . , - solid, points, wire frame. , .

Spectrum s una visualitzaci que mostra un analitzador d'espectre giratori en 3D renderitzat amb que es mou al ritme de la msica creant un efecte d'ona al llarg de la graella de l'espectre. Tamb t opcions per ajustar l'alada de la barra de l'espectre, la seva velocitat, i com es renderitzen les barres (slid, punts, malla de filferro). Una visualitzaci que utilitza poca CPU i que s veu molt b.

Spectrum je vizualizace zobrazujc rotujc 3D spektrln analyztor rendrovan v , kter se pohybuje v rytmu hudby a vytv vlnov efekt nap spektrln mkou. Obsahuje tak nastaven pro pizpsoben vky sloupc spektra, rychlosti a zpsobu vykreslen (vyplnn, body, drtov model). Je to velmi lehk vizualizace s nzkou zat CPU, kter vypad skvle.

-spektrum er en visualisering, der viser en roterende 3D-spektrumanalysator renderet i DirectX, som bevger sig i takt til musikken og skaber en blgeeffekt p tvrs af spektrumfeltet. Den har ogs indstillinger til at justere spektrumliniens hjde, fart og hvordan den bliver renderet (fast, punkter, trdramme). Det er en letvgtsvisualisering med lavt CPU-forbrug, som ser godt ud.

Spectrum ist eine Visualisierung, die eine rotierende Spektrum Analyse in 3D zeigt. Die Visualisierung wird so gerendert, dass sie sich zum Takt der Musik bewegt und eine Welle ber das Spektrum Grid legt. Es lsst sich neben der Hhe, die Geschwindigkeit als auch die Art der Balken (durchgehend, Punkte, Drahtgeflecht) einstellen. Eine schne Visualisierung, die nur eine geringe CPU-Last erzeugt

Se puede ajustar la altura de las barras, su velocidad, y como son renderizadas (slido, puntos, malla). Es una visualizacin que utiliza poca CPU y muy agradable.

Spectrum es una visualizacin que muestra un analizador de espectro en 3D girando, renderizado con , que se mueve al ritmo de la msica creando un efecto de onda en la rejilla del espectro. Se puede ajustar la altura de las barras, su velocidad, y como son renderizadas (slido, puntos, malla). Es una visualizacin que utiliza poca CPU y muy agradable.

Espectro es una Visualizacin que muestra un Analizador de Especto en 3D rotando renderizado en que se mueve al ritmo de la msica creando un efecto de onda a travs del espectro de la red. Tambin tiene configuraciones para ajustar la altura de la barra de espectro, su velocidad, y cmo las barras son renderizadas (slidas, puntos, malla de alambre) y es una buena visualizacin liviana, de poco uso de cpu que se ve genial.

Spectrum on visuaal, mis nitab 3D spektraalanalsi renderdatud 'is, mis liigub liigub muusika rtmis luues laineefekti le spektraalvrgustiku. Lisaks on olemas ka vimalus seadistada spektri krgust, selle kiirust ja kuidas ribasid renderdatakse (tahkis, punktid, srestik). Spectrum on hea vljangemisega kerge ja vhese protsessorikasutusega visuaal.

Nytt pyrivn 3D-spektrianalysaattorin, joka liikkuu musiikin tahdissa tuottaen aaltotehosteen spektrikuvaajaan. Spektripalkin korkeuden, nopeuden, ja piirtotavan (tytetyt, pisteet, riviivat) voi asettaa asetuksista. Spectrum on kevyt visualisointi joka nytt hyvlt.

Spectrum est une visualisation affichant un analyseur de spectre 3D en rotation, sous . Il ragit au rythme de la musique, crant un effet d'onde sur la grille du spectre. Il propose divers paramtres pour ajuster la hauteur, la vitesse, et le rendu des barres du spectre (plein, points, fil de fer). Une visualisation lgre, peu gourmande en CPU et agrable regarder.

Spectrum unha Visualizacin que amosa un analizador de espectro virando en 3D renderizado con que se move ritmo da msica creando un efecto de onde longo da grella do espectro. Tamn ten opcins para axustar a altura da barra, a velocidade e como se renderizan as barras (slidas, puntos, malla) do espectro. bonito, lixeiro, de baixo custo en CPU.

Spectrum je vizualizacija koja prikazuje rotirajui 3D spektralni analizator renderiran u -u koji se pokree u ritmu muzike stvarajui efekt valova u spektralnoj mrei. Takoer sadri i postavke za namjetanje visine sprektralnih traka, njihove brzine, i naina na koji su prikazane (popunjeno, toke, iani okvir). Vizualizacija izgleda sjajno te je malih memorijskih i CPU zahtjeva.

Az Spectrum egy olyan vizualizci ami egy 3D hang spektrum analiztort mutat segtsgvel megjelentve, ami a zene ritmusra mozog egy hullm-effektust kpezve a teljes spektrumhln. Bellthat a spektrum oszlopok magassga, mozgsi sebessge s hogy az oszlopok hogyan jelenjenek meg (teli, pontok, drtvz). Ez egy kis erforrsigny vizualizci ami nagyon jl mutat.

Spectrum una visualizzazione che mostra un analizzatore di spettro renderizzato in che si muove a tempo di musica creando un effetto onda attraverso la griglia. E' possibile regolare varie impostazioni: l'altezza delle barre, la velocit di risposta e come le barre sono renderizzate (piene, con punti o con righe). E' una visualizzazione rilassante e con basso uso del processore.

Spectrum is a Visualisation showing a rotating 3D Spectrum Analyzer rendered in that moves to the beat of the music creating a wave effect across the spectrum grid. It also has settings to adjust the spectrum bar height, Its speed, and how the bars are rendered (solid, points, wire frame) and is a nice light weight, low cpu useage visualisation that looks great

Spektro vizualizacija, kurioje besisukant 3D spektro analizatori, priimt , katras juda muzikos ritm, steigiantis bang poveik visame spektro tinklelyje. Spectrum is a Visualisation showing a rotating 3D Spectrum Analyzer rendered in that moves to the beat of the music creating a wave effect across the spectrum grid. It also has settings to adjust the spectrum bar height, Its speed, and how the bars are rendered (solid, points, wire frame) and is a nice light weight, low cpu useage visualisation that looks great

Spectrum is een visualisatie met een draaiende 3D Spectrum Analyzer gerenderd in . Deze visualisatie beweegt op het ritme van de muziek en creert een golf effect over het hele spectrum. Het heeft instellingen om de barhoogte en de snelheid aan te passen, en hoe de staven worden weergegeven (vast, punten, draad frame) en is een mooie lichtgewicht visualisatie die weinig van de cpu vraagt en er geweldig uit ziet.

Spectrum er en visualisering som viser et roterende 3D Spectrum Analyzer gjengitt i som flytter til rytmen i musikken skaper en blge effekt over hele spekteret rutenettet. Det har ogs innstillinger for justere spekterets bar hyde, hastighet, og hvordan barene gjengis (solid, punkt, wireframe) og er en fin lett vekt, lav cpu brukende visualisering som ser flott ut
Wizualizacja pokazuje obracajcy si, trjwymiarowy analizator widma, renderowany przy uyciu . Moesz ustawi wysoko supkw, ich prdko i wygld.

Spectrum uma visualizao que mostra um analisador espectral 3D rotativo, renderizado em , que se sincroniza com o ritmo da msica, criando assim um efeito de ondas na grelha espectral. Pode-se definir a altura das barras, a sua velocidade e como so renderizadas (slido, pontos ou contorno). uma visualizao que no utiliza muito CPU e tem um aspecto fantstico.

O Spectrum uma visualizao que mostra um analisador espectral rotativo 3D, renderizado em , que se sincroniza com a batida, criando assim um efeito de ondas na grelha espectral. Pode-se definir a altura das barras, a sua velocidade e como so renderizadas (slido, pontos ou contorno). uma visualizao que utiliza pouco o CPU e com um visual fantstico.

Spectrul este o vizualizare care afieaz un analizor de spectre 3D rotativ randat n care se mic dup btile muzicii crend un val dea-lungul grilei spectrale. De asemenea, are setri pentru ajustarea nlimii brilor spectrale, a vitezei, i a modului n care brile sunt randate (umplere, puncte, contur). Este o vizualizare cu consum redus al procesorului care arat fantastic de bine.

Spectrum je vizualizcia zobrazujca rotujci 3D spektrlny analyztor vykresovan pomocou , ktor sa hbe v rytme hudby a tak vytvra vlny naprie mriekou spektra.[CR] Zrove m nastavenia upravujce vku stpcov spektra, ich rchlos a ako s vykresovan (vyplnen, body, drtov model). Je to jednoduch vizualizcia s nzkou zaou CPU, ktor vborne vyzer.

Spectrum je vizualizacija, ki prikazuje vrteo 3D spektralno analizato, generirano v , ki se premika v ritmu glasbe in ustvarja uinek valovanja v celotnem spektru. Vsebuje tudi nastavitve za prilagoditev viine spektra, hitrosti in oblike (polno, toke, okvir) ter je varna vizualizacija z nizka porabo CPU-ja, ki izgleda super.

Spektrum r en visualisering som visar en roterande 3D-spektrumanalysator renderad i . Den rr sig till musikens takt och skapar en vgeffekt ver spektrat. -spektrum har instllningar fr att justera staplarnas hjd, deras hastighet, hur de ska visas (solida, punkter, ramverk) och r en visualisering med lg cpu-anvndning samtidigt som den ser bra ut
